mapper.select: SELECT counsel.id AS counselId, U.user_id AS userId, col.college AS college, dept.dept AS dept, U.student_code AS studentCode, C.year AS year, C.semester AS semester, C.class_no AS classNo, U.name AS name, counsel.counsel_datetime AS counselDatetime, counsel.counsel_contents AS counselContents FROM pl_center.counsel AS counsel INNER JOIN pl_center.class AS C ON counsel.class_id = C.id INNER JOIN pl_center.users AS U ON counsel.user_code = U.user_code INNER JOIN pl_center.college AS col ON U.col_id = col.id INNER JOIN pl_center.dept AS dept ON U.dept_id = dept.id
